ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: East of England NHS Collaborative Procurement Hub c/o West Suffolk NHS Foundation Trust

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: East of England NHS Collaborative Procurement Hub c/o West Suffolk NHS Foundation Trust

TITLE.P: Contrast media and barium products, injectors and associated consumables

SHORT_DESCR.P: The framework agreement is for the supply and delivery of contrast media, barium products, injectors, associated consumables and barium insufflators. The framework agreement will be awarded for 24 months with the option to extend for two further periods of 12 months.
The framework has been split into 49 Lots, further details on the Lots can be found within the Lot specific areas of this contract notice.

TITLE.P: Contrast Media

SHORT_DESCR.P: The framework agreement is for the supply and delivery of contrast media, The framework agreement will be awarded for 24 months with the option to extend for two further periods of 12 months.

TITLE.P: Barium Products

SHORT_DESCR.P: The framework agreement is for the supply and delivery of barium. The framework agreement will be awarded for 24 months with the option to extend for two further periods of 12 months.

TITLE.P: Syringe Injectors - Ceiling Mounted - CT Injectors – Multi Dosing - 5 Yearly Cost

SHORT_DESCR.P: The supply and delivery of syringeless, CT, ceiling mounted, multi dosing injectors and the provision of related services, including, but not limited to training, maintenance and software upgrades.The framework agreement will be awarded for 24 months with the option to extend for two further periods of 12 months.

TITLE.P: Syringe less Injectors — Ceiling Mounted — CT Injector – Multi Dosing — 5 Year Cost

SHORT_DESCR.P: The supply and delivery of syringeless, CT, ceiling mounted, multi dosing injectors and the provision of related services, including, but not limited to, training, maintenance and software upgrades. The Framework Agreement will be for a period of 24 months with the option to extend for 2 further periods of 12 months.

TITLE.P: Syringe less Injectors — Ceiling Mounted – Angiography – Multi Dosing — Annual Cost

SHORT_DESCR.P: The supply and delivery of syringeless, CT, ceiling mounted, multi dosing injectors and the provision of related services, including, but not limited to, training, maintenance and software upgrades.The Framework Agreement will be for a period of 24 months with the option to extend for 2 further periods of 12 months.

TITLE.P: Syringe less Injectors — Ceiling Mounted – Angiography – Multi Dosing — 5 Year Cost

SHORT_DESCR.P: The supply and delivery of syringeless, Angiography, ceiling mounted, multi dosing injectors and the provision of related services, including, but not limited to, training, maintenance and software upgrades. The Framework Agreement will be for a period of 24 months with the option to extend for 2 further periods of 12 months.
